    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    Facet RelativePosition_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:RelativePosition_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<RelativePosition approximateDistanceInd="true" direction="Example String Value" distance="Example String Value" indexPointCode="Cross street" name="Example String Value" nearestInd="true" positionAccuracy="Zip9Code" primaryInd="true" toFrom="ToFacility" unitOfMeasureCode="Miles" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4">
    <Transportations>
        <Transportation description="Example String Value" includedInd="true" notificationRequired="Example String Value" objID="transportation_1" typicalTravelTime="PT1004199059S">
            <Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">guid12345</Identifier>
            <TransportationRef>transportation_1</TransportationRef>
            <Type>Bicycle</Type>
            <MultimediaCollection lastUpdated="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00">
                <MultimediaText caption="Example String Value" language="en" lastUpdated="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" objID="multimedia_1" version="Example String Value">
                    <Category>Ballroom</Category>
                    <AdditionalDetailType>Advanced booking information</AdditionalDetailType>
                    <InfoType>Address</InfoType>
                    <TextCategory caption="Example String Value" category="2" removalInd="true">
                        <Text language="en" textFormat="PlainText">Formatted text example.</Text>
                    </TextCategory>
                </MultimediaText>
            </MultimediaCollection>
            <OperationSchedule additionalOperationInfoCode="2" daysOfWeek="Monday Tuesday Wednesday" frequency="Example String Value" text="Example String Value">
                <DateTimeSpanWindowsDetail>
                    <TimeSpan end="2016-08-28T04:32:52Z" start="2016-08-22T19:32:52Z"/>
                    <StartWindow end="2016-08-28T04:32:52Z" start="2016-08-22T19:32:52Z"/>
                    <EndWindow end="2016-08-28T04:32:52Z" start="2016-08-22T19:32:52Z"/>
                    <Duration>PT130S</Duration>
                    <DurationUnit>SUN</DurationUnit>
                </DateTimeSpanWindowsDetail>
            </OperationSchedule>
            <Description>Example String Value</Description>
            <ChargeUnit>Per unit</ChargeUnit>
            <CurrencyAmount currencyCode="USD" minorUnit="2">80000</CurrencyAmount>
            <AddressDetail language="en" role="Home" validInd="true">
                <AddressLine>111 Travers St, Dun Laoghaire Co. Dublin Ireland</AddressLine>
                <BldgRoom buldingInd="true">Bldg H</BldgRoom>
                <Number pO_Box="98567499" ruralRouteNmbr="88" streetDirection="NNW" streetNmbrSuffix="B">563</Number>
                <Street>Travers Street</Street>
                <City>Dublin</City>
                <County>Fairfax</County>
                <StateProv name="Texas">TX</StateProv>
                <Country name="Ireland">IR</Country>
                <PostalCode>32165-9999</PostalCode>
                <Remark>This address should be used for all official correspondences.</Remark>
                <Privacy optInDate="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No"/>
                <Type>Business</Type>
                <Use>Billing</Use>
            </AddressDetail>
            <LocationCode city="Lancaster" codeContext="Example String Value" country="US" stateProvince="PA">Example String Value</LocationCode>
        </Transportation>
    </Transportations>
    <Description name="paragraph name" number="1234">
        <Text language="en" textFormat="HTML">Formatted text example.</Text>
        <Image colorSpace="Example String Value" dimensionCategory="Example String Value" format="2" objID="image_1" originalIndicatorInd="true" resolution="3456" sort="2345" version="Example String Value">
            <Identifier organization="Acme" system="sysABC3344" url="http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00">guid12345</Identifier>
            <ImageRef>image_1</ImageRef>
            <URL>http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema</URL>
            <Details applicableEnd="2011-07-04" applicableStart="2011-01-24" author="Example String Value" copyrightEnd="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" copyrightNotice="Example String Value" copyrightOwner="Example String Value" copyrightStart="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" effectiveEnd="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" effectiveStart="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00">Example String Value</Details>
            <MultimediaDescription caption="The Empire State Building at sunset." language="en" title="Example String Value">
                <FormattedTextSubSection subCode="Example String Value" subSectionNumber="4567" subTitle="Example String Value"/>
            </MultimediaDescription>
            <DateTimeStamp create="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" creatorID="c123456789" lastModifierID="m987654321" lastModify="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" purge="2011-12-05">2011-12-05T06:00:00Z</DateTimeStamp>
            <Email defaultInd="true" remark="Example String Value" textFormat="Example String Value" validInd="true">
                <Address>Example String Value</Address>
                <Type>Business</Type>
                <Privacy optInDate="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" optInStatus="OptedOut" optOutDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" shareMarketInd="Inherit" shareSyncInd="Yes"/>
            </Email>
            <Dimensions height="2345" unitOfMeasureCode="2" width="1234"/>
            <File name="Example String Value" originalName="Example String Value" size="3456"/>
            <Geolocation altitude="Example String Value" altitudeUnitOfMeasure_Enum="Kilometers" formatURL="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" latitude="Example String Value" longitude="Example String Value" mapURL="http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00"/>
        </Image>
        <URL>http://www.OpenTravel.org/ns/OTA2/Common_v01_00</URL>
        <ParagraphListItem language="en" listItem="1234" text2="Formatted text example." textFormat="PlainText"/>
        <DateTimeStamp create="2011-12-05T06:00:00Z" creatorID="c123456789" lastModifierID="m987654321" lastModify="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" purge="2011-01-24">2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00</DateTimeStamp>
    </Description>
</RelativePosition>

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        Transportations
        Transportation locations close to facility.
        Details
        Type Transportations
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        Description
        Description of directions to facility.
        Details
        Type http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Description
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        direction
        Defines the cardinal direction (e.g., north, south, southwest).
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:string
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        distance
        Defines the distance between two points.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:string
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        unitOfMeasureCode
        The unit of measure in a code format. Refer to OpenTravel Code List Unit of Measure Code (UOM).
        Details
        Type UnitOfMeasure_Enum
        Example Value Miles
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        indexPointCode
        This is the object referred to by the relative position (e.g. cross street, airport). Refer to OpenTravel Code List Index Point Code (IPC).
        Details
        Type IndexPointCode_Enum
        Example Value Cross street
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        name
        This is used to accommodate a city name, rail station name etc. when using the indexPoint attribute.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        toFrom
        Used to indicate whether the context is to a facility or from a facility.
        Details
        Type ToFrom_Enum
        Example Value ToFacility
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        positionAccuracy
        Indicates the accuracy of the property's geo-coding, since the property's longitude and latitude may not always be exact. Refer to OpenTravel Code List Position Accuracy Code (PAC).
        Details
        Type PositionAccuracy_Enum
        Example Value Zip9Code
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Indicator Summary

        Indicators 
        Name Description
        nearestInd
        The indicator for whether this location is nearest.
        primaryInd
        Indicates whether the reference point is considered the main reference point for the specific type of IndexPointCode (e.g., in Dallas, where IndexPointCode=airport Dallas/Fort Worth airport would be the primary airport even if another airport such as Love Field is closer).
        approximateDistanceInd
        When true, the distance information is approximate.

      • Alias Summary

        Aliases 
        Directions_Summary
